content.raw: @Tom_Xiong a quick and dirty approach is to use the web server shown in the example from Steve Peters. That gives you access to the files in the workspace directory (ws). You can write a log file there and down load it to see what your robot is doing. Do something like "curl | tail" to see the most recent activity.
content.html: @Tom_Xiong a quick and dirty approach is to use the web server shown in the example from Steve Peters. That gives you access to the files in the workspace directory (ws). You can write a log file there and down load it to see what your robot is doing. Do something like "curl | tail" to see the most recent activity.
